comment: Prof. Mutlu is nice and friendly. She makes the course a bit tougher than expected. I took the course as a Management elective looking to get an easy A but couldn't. She would sometimes deduct marks for the unexpected small mistakes from the assignments and you'll know about them when everything is done. So u don't get a chance to make yourself bet

Very nice and interactive course and class. Prof. Mutlu gives great feedback on papers and projects presented. Enjoyed learning about International Strategic Management. Great Professor with lot of international experience in management.

She is a great professor who gives really great feedback on assignments. I'm taking her online course, and the only problem that I've been having is the quizzes. There's 12 total, and you take them with Connect. They easily take the full hour to actually finish because of the level of difficulty.

This was a very interactive, discussion based class.  There were no exams.  A good number of writing assignments and group projects but grading criteria was very clear. She's extremely helpful, approachable, and responsive to questions.  I'd definitely take this professor for another class.
